attributes.action: The government isn’t doing enough to stop the spread of the virus Act Now!
attributes.additional_details: In my opinion the government is just not doing enough and more needs to happen in order to protect the British public
attributes.background: Consider what the other counties are doing and the fact it is working for them.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
	
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's clear that you're concerned about the Government's response to coronavirus, but it's not clear exactly what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like to happen. If you want the Government to implement a lockdown, you may wish to publish this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
